name: guillotine
content:
guillotine noun
(DEVICE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or S ] a device, invented in France, consisting of a sharp blade in a tall frame, used in the past for killing criminals by cutting off their heads: go to the guillotine King Louis XVI and Marie Antoinette went to the guillotine (= were killed by the guillotine) during the French Revolution.
koya79/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
[ C ] UK a device with a long sharp blade that is used for cutting large quantities of paper
